fn.p: Funding. This work was supported by Laboratoire d'Excellence Integrative Biology of Emerging Infectious Diseases (grant no. ANR-10-LABX-62-IBEID), by the Direction Internationale de l'Institut Pasteur, and by the ANR projects BiodivHealthSEA and FutureHealthSEA (ANR-17-CE35-0003-02) for fieldwork studies in Thailand.
